description:
**Supports iOS4 and above only.**

˙EDITORS' CHOICE — 9.5/10
“Simply the best game you can buy for the iPhone.”
˙ - IGN

˙PLATINUM AWARD — 10/10
“Unquestionably the best game yet on the iPhone.”
˙ — PocketGamer

The award-winning roly-poly puzzle game is back and better than ever! Rolandoland has been invaded and the Rolandos need your help. Using tilt, tap, and multi-touch controls, you will solve physics puzzles and toy with interactive environments, all while trying to evade pesky enemies! Compete with friends through leaderboards as you safely guide the Rolandos through 50+ levels to victory!

• EPIC PLATFORM ADVENTURE, NOW WITH OVER 50 LEVELS 
 Four unique worlds and all new secret levels to unlock!

• INTERACTIVE ENVIRONMENTS
 Manipulate more than a dozen gizmos,
 including lifts, catapults & bomb dispensers

• FUN WITH PHYSICS
 Rolandos can bounce on trampolines, push
 blocks and nudge bombs & sleeping Rolandos

ROLANDO is created by Hand Circus and presented by ngmoco:) exclusively for the iPhone and iPod touch
releaseNotes:
Supports iOS4 and above only. If you experience crashing on launch, please update your device to the latest OS.
- Registering with plus+ network is optional 
- Optimized graphics for retina display 
- Fixes an issue where saved games could become corrupted
